::Zardus::

Zardus nods, his mind already seeing the possibilities that this new .... 
thing would bring. The fact that it got into the Alliance base without being 
detected, and even went all the way to the conference room was extrodanary in 
itself, and if he could get by other scanners.....

"I have no intention of killing you," he says to it, "But how did you get 
into my base without being detected?"
